msg.voice_message.vocalized.matthew.voca: Hi! This is Matthew, the built-in male voice of the Vocalized mod, powered by Amazon Polly.
msg.voice_message.vocalized.salli.vocali: Hi! Here's Salli, the built-in female voice of the Vocalized mod, powered by Amazon Polly.
msg.voice_message.vocalized.zhi_yu.vocal: 您好，我叫知语，是 Vocalized 模组的内置中文语音，由 Amazon Polly 赋能。
screen.vocalized.cfg.title: Vocalized Settings
